transcript:
大家好，我是李璨。
Hi everyone, I’m Li Can. 老马呀，就是口语老炮儿马思瑞，
 Laoma, the Oral English Master Chris, 终于把他压箱底的东西给拿出来了。
Has finally brought out this most precious thing from the bottom of chest. 很多人像我一样都特别好奇，
A lot of you must be as curious as me: 就是：他中文为什么说的这么好？
Why does he speak Chinese so fluently? 而且说的还是北京腔。
And with Beijing accent as well. 前几天他就专门出了这么一个视频，
A few days ago he posted a video specifically to 回答了大家的疑惑。
Answer everyone's question. 同时他分享了八个学习中文的诀窍。
He also shared with us Eight Chinese Learning Skills of his own. 咱们今天就看一下这个视频，
Let's take a look at this video. 同时呀我也和大家分享一下，
I'd also like to share with you guys,  我这么多年学习语言以及我教授中文这个心得体会，
Some of the experiences and ideas I got from learning languages and teaching Chinese all these years. 来做一下对照。
So as to make a comparison. 那么咱们开始吧。
Let's get started. All right. 所以我今天终于要跟大家分享一下，
 So today I'm finally going to reveal to you, 我中文是怎么学习的？
The secret of my learning Chinese. How did I learn Chinese? What's up guys! 我是口语老炮儿马思瑞！
 I'm Oral English Master Chris! My English name is Chris, and I've been learning Chinese for almost 10 years. 哦，他学了十年啊。
Oh, he's been learning for ten years. 也挺久的时间了啊。
That's quite a long time. 而且呢还想跟你们分享一下我自己使用的一些技巧，
 and tell you some f the tips of tricks that I used 怎么能让你自己的英语中文，任何语言，
 that can help you learn English, Chinese, 学的更快一些，让你的学习事半功倍，效率更高。
 or any other language much faster. 那我也看过很多在网上的视频，
I've seen a lot of videos  都说我的中文是什么所有老外当中最好的。
and comments online talking about my Chinese is the best of all the laowei out there... Doesn't mean that my Chinese is perfect. 因为我中文真的不完美。
Because my Chinese is definitely not perfect. 就算我身边的人我真的见过的认识的，
Just thinking of the people around me 有好多说外国人中文说的比我好很多。
there are so many foreigner who speak Chinese better than me. 你老能去特别好玩的特别漂亮的地儿。
I can always go to some very beautiful places. 哎，这个曹操，
Ah, this Cao Cao, 我知道，他中文确实说得特别特别好。
I know him, his Chinese is definitely native-level. and that's just people who make content make videos and are you know fairly well known 也说的比我好，
There are so many who are better than me. you can check some of these people out. 让我看一下。
Let me take a look. 啊这个艾米，艾米她中文说的还罢了。
Ah, Amy, well, her Chinese is OK. 雪莲、贝乐泰挺好的。
Xuelian, Beiletai, well, quite good. 星悦，可以。这几个我觉得
Xingyue, quite good. In my opinion none of these 可能没他说的好，他过谦了。
speak Chinese better than him, he is too modest. 太谦虚了！
He is over modest! 但是我为什么比很多其他人说的好呢？
That being said, why might I speak better than a lot of learners out there? because I've spent so much on it. 我学习中文说中文，
The time I've spent learning and speaking Chinese, 我在这几块花的时间真的就已经，
Has definitely gone way beyond 超过这个一万小时定律。说到这点，真的是学习语言啊，
the so-called "Ten-Thousand-Hour Rule." Speaking of this, language learning, 特别是学习中文呀，
Especially Chinese learning, 你真的需要花费特别特别多的时间和精力进去学习。
Really requires a huge amount of time and effort. 你不能指望只是偶尔三天打鱼两天晒网，
You can go fishing for three days and dry the nets for two, 你就能让自己中文说的特别好,不可能的事情，
Then expect your Chinese to be fluent, that's totally impossible, 朋友们。中国有一个成语叫做：
My friends. As a Chinese idiom goes: 只要功夫深，铁杵磨成针。
As long as one works at it hard enough, an iron pestle can even be ground down to a needle. 大家知道铁杵什么？就是铁棒啊，铁棍子，
 Do you know what is iron pestle? It's iron rod, 这么粗的东西。
Something so thick. 然后磨磨磨磨磨，再磨磨磨磨磨，
Then you start to grind and grind... 都能磨成绣花针那么小。
Then it will be finally ground into a very small needle. 怎么做的？就是花时间，花精力，
How to achieve that? It requires a lot of time, effort, 还有耐心。学习语言就是这么一个过程，
and patience. Language learning is such a process, 你就需要花这么多时间和精力进去。
You need to put a lot of time and efforts in. 大家可以看，
As you can see, 老马他花了超过一万多小时啊学习中文。
Laoma has put more than ten thousands hours into learning Chinese. 现在其实说实话就是你要学习语言，
As a matter of face, if you want to learn a language now,  根本没必要去语言国去学习，
there actually is no need to go to the country where this language is spoken, 都不是一个必须的选项。
that's not a must anymore. 因为你能接触的语言材料太多了。
Because you can access to a huge amount of language materials. 就算要进行对话，也是有方法可以实现的。
Even if you want to have conversations, there are also ways to do that. 关键是你首先要把时间和精力投入进去，
The key is putting time and efforts in to it, 还要持之以恒。
and with perseverance. 所有的技巧其实它并不是那么神秘的。
All the tricks are not that mysterious after all. 无他，唯熟尔！
There's nothing to it, but familiarity. 就是说就是：熟能生巧嘛。
That is: practice makes perfect. 时间花进去，精力花进去，
As long as you put time and efforts in it, 反反复复的做，反反复复的练习，
and learn it and practice it over and over again, 总会做好的。
You can definitely achieve the goal. 所以大家想一下：
So, you can think about it: 自己在中文学习上花了多少时间？
How much time you've spent on Chinese learning? So let's get started! 那我觉得学外语的时候看任何电视剧、
I think that when learning a foreign language, watching any sorts of TV 电影啊什么的都非常有用。
or movies is super useful. 我是2011年到的中国是国庆节，
I first got to China in 2011 during Golden Week, 然后第一年在一个私立学校，
And I took classes at a private Chinese school for the first year, 学了这种系统的普通的课程，
Where I was learning in a normal, structure manner, 小班课一对一的都有。
Small group classes, 1-to-1 lessons, etc. 但是我觉得我进步最大的时候，
But I would say that my biggest improvement came 就是第二年我开始看好多电视剧。
in the second year when I started watching a bunch of Chinese TV. What show was it? 非诚勿扰。
You are the One. 对其实，这个说到他第一点，
Yeah, speaking of his first trick, 他第一点就是看电视节目嘛。
His first trick is watching TV shows. 其实他一开始说看了很多电视剧啊，
As a matter of fact, he said he watched a lot of TV series, 但他接下来提的东西并不是电视剧啊，
but what he mentioned is not TV series, 是一个综艺节目。
It's a variety show. 其实我在另外一个视频里有讲过就是，
As I mentioned in any video that,  其实相对于电视剧而言，
compared to the TV series, 综艺节目更适合大家学习日常的真正的中文口语。
Variety show is actually more useful in learning real spoken Chinese used in daily life. 这个综艺节目它是没有台本，
Because there's no so-called script for a variety show, 你不需要按照台本去念的。
People in it doesn't have to read the lines from the script. 台本呢里面有台词，都是人编出来。
The usual lines in the script are made up by people,  很多时候有些话会比较生硬，有些会说的
Sometimes they tend to be very wooden, some of them are 不是那么的口语化。
not that natural as those we use in daily-life speaking. 但是综艺就是人们随口说出，脱口而出的东西。
In the variety show people just say what's in their mind, and just spit it out. 那都是自然而然的在日常生活中很习惯的说法。
The words spoken are all those we tend to use in the daily life. 说他这个非诚勿扰啊，
Speaking of this You are the One, 非诚勿扰就是一个相亲节目嘛。
You are the One is a dating show. 咱们先听一下他咋说的啊。
Let's here what he's going to say first. My English name is Chris, and I've been learning Chinese for... 这个节目就是这样：
This show is just like this 比如一个男嘉宾上来之后，自报家门介绍一下自己，
After a single man comes up and gives a brief introduction of himself, 女嘉宾要比如说对他也感兴趣就会留灯，
If the girls are interested in him, they will keep the light on, 不感兴趣就是灭灯。
If not, they will put out the light. 刚那个“噔噔噔”的声音就是灭灯的声音。
The sound you heard is the sound of putting out lights. 全黑。全灭。没人要他，没人对他感兴趣。
All black. All out. No one wants him, nobody is interested in him. I have watched so much 非常勿扰。
 You are the One. 但是非诚勿扰对于一个水平稍微低一点的学生来说，
 When it comes to people at a slightly lower level 非常有帮助因为全部都是相亲嘛。
it's super helpful, because it's dating show, 大家都是刚认识，他们就会做各种各样的自我介绍，
So everyone has pretty much just met, you hear all sorts of self-introductions, 他们就会去做这些简单的
plus you hear a lot of simple 了解对方的一些寒暄闲聊等等等等。
Small talk while they try to get to know one another. 他确实说到点上。就是综艺节目它用语啊都比较简单。
He actually hit the point. The words and expressions in the variety show are quite simple. 所以我之前也说过我想做一期就
So once I mentioned I want to make an episode,  推荐给大家一些中国的综艺节目。
To recommend some variety shows to you. 我先给大家推荐一个吧。
Let me recommend one to you this time. 就我最近和我老婆成天看的，就我们吃中饭的时候，
This show is watched by me and my wife during the lunch time, 就坐在那块边吃饭边看的。
We enjoy the show while eating lunch, 就一个是《向往的生活》。
It is Back to Field. 这《向往生活》的主要就是让城里人体验一下这个，
The purpose of Back to Field is making the city people experience, 在乡村生活的这种状态。
the life in the village. 因为它很生活化嘛，就是：
Because it's about daily life, which means: 就每天涉及的就是做饭呀、吃饭啊、聊天呀、
The show is mainly about cooking, eating, chatting, 还有招待朋友啊、出去干活啊、或周边去玩一下，
Entertaining friends, going to do field work, or play around, 这些事情。都是很基础很生活化的东西。
All these stuff, which are all very basic and daily-life sort of things. 大家通过这个节目能知道特别多
Through this show, you can learn a lot of  关于生活里头这些用语啊。怎么聊天？怎么寒暄啊？对。
Words and expressions used in the daily life. How to chat? How to have small talk? Right. 怎么对话呀？就特别特别实用。
How to have a conversation? It's very useful. 真的我是觉得这个节目对我而言，要是
Really, from my perspective, if  国外有一个这样类似节目我觉得绝对会把它当做
if there's a similar show in the foreign language, I'd take it as  学习语言的第一个材料。
the first learning material to learn that language. 在YouTube上是找得到的，
You can find if on YouTube, 大家可以找一下看一下。
You can check it out. 反正中国的节目都有一个好处，
There's an advantage to every Chinese show,  就是有中文字幕嘛。
which is embedded Chinese subtitles. 很方便。所以老马在这个地方提到他第一个诀窍呀，
It's very convenient. So the first trick as mentioned by Laoma here is, 就是看电视。
Watching TV shows. 这个确实很方便。
It's really very convenient. 现在特别是通过互联网能看到各种这样的电视节目啊，
Especially now, you can watch all sorts of TV shows through the Internet, 特别是中文电视节目啊，
Especially the Chinese TV shows  有个优点：就是免费，在YouTube上都能看到，
have an advantage: it's free, you can find them on YouTube, 不管是综艺节目还是电视剧都能看得到。
No matter they are variety shows or TV series. 太方便了！
It's super convenient! 那我做的第二件事情就是什么都写下，
The second thing I did...was writing down everything, 什么都会记下。
I constantly took notes of everything I saw. 这什么都写下来什么都记下来。
Writing down everything and taking notes of everything,  那之前标题上也含着：好记性不如烂笔头。
Plus the sentence in the head: The palest ink is better than the best memory. 这是中国人常说一句话。
 Which is frequently quoted by Chinese in the daily life. 就什么东西，有时候脑袋纯记啊记不住，
Because you can't memorize something just using your brain, 把它记下来，用笔头啊，
You can write it down with your pen, 写写写。烂笔头写着写烂了嘛，就是一直写用的特别的多。
Just write. Broken pen means it's broken through too many usages. 哎很多人记下来，你放在本子上，
So people write it down on the notebooks, 偶尔去翻一翻，“啊！”你就想起来。
When you sometimes browse through it, you will be "Ah!" I remember it. 你要只是放在脑子里。很多东西“哇”！
But if you only store it in your brain. A lot of things will be 散开了，不见了，
scattered, and gone for good, 啊~想不起来了。
Ah~I just can't remember it. 然后自己也可以去造一些句子，
Then I'd also go make my own example sentences. 自己可以说一说，
You could also say them all out loud. 现在这样我们就是眼睛、
Basically this way you'd be using your eyes, 嘴巴、舌头、耳朵、手，多感官的这种训练。
mouth, tongue, ears, hands, you've got multi-sensory training. 这说的没错，
That's right. 就是说这个例句啊。自己可以造句啊，
 Talking about example sentences. You can make your own. 自己造句其实我觉得比纯粹你听啊，
In my opinion, making your own example sentence is much useful than  更有用处。它其实不只是输入了，
just listening. It's not just input,  不只是输入你还输出了，对不对？
Because it's not just input, it's output as well, right? 输出其实更有利于你学习语言。
Output is actually more useful for your language learning. 第三就是影子跟读。
The third thing is shadowing! 影子跟读这个真的是特别好的方法，
Shadowing is actually a very useful method, 其实在很多人学习语言的时候都知道这个方法。
As a matter of fact, a lot of you out there must've known method before. 你要做的叫做 Choral Repetition，
The method he promotes is focused on choral repetition. 你可以在一个班级做，
You could do it in a small group class. 或者我作为一个人单独学习的，
Or you could do it while learning by yourself. 那我就会拿一个音频一个视频，
I'd just go grab any audio or video file 然后在这儿，这个人开始说话的时候，
And when the person started speaking, 我自己同步跟他说，
I would do my best to speak in sync with him. 不是听完重复。我基本上就隔着0.1秒，
I wasn't that normal: Listen. Finish. Repeat. Basically within a 0.1 second delay, 就开始重复，so
I would try to repeat. It's very hard。 你需要暂停就暂停，
If you have to pause, just pause. 要调整这个倍速也就可以调一下。
If you need to adjust the speed, you can do that as well. Slow it down, Just make sure that you can repeat Repeat, repeat! 因为我们这个肌肉记忆是我们最终的目标，
Our ultimate goal is to kind of reach that level of muscle memory. 对吧？对对对。
Right? Exactly. 最终形成这种肌肉记忆嘛。
Finally reach that level of muscle memory. 这个同步跟读就是别人开始说了，
This Choral Repetition means when a person starts to speak,  你马上跟上去，
You follow along immediately, 一开始可能会：哎呀跟不上呀，哦吼吼。
At very beginning, it might be: ah, I can't follow, ah... 嘴巴会打绊，对吧？
Your tongue will trip, right? 但是慢慢跟多了，你就能跟上他的节奏，
But the more you follow, the better you can follow his rhythm, 说话的习惯。你就慢慢慢慢慢就练出来。
and his way of speaking. You will gradually reach that goal. 最重要就是形成一种肌肉记忆，这是非常重要。
The key is to reach that level of muscle memory, which is super important. 能形成一种肌肉记忆，
As long as you can reach that level of muscle memory,  就在语言学习中你就成功了一大半了。
Your language learning would be half done and more. 你那个舌头知道放哪了，怎么说呀。
Your would know where to put your tongue, and how to say words. 就很自然而然的形成了我们说话的习惯了。
Then you would gradually grown into the speaking habit of us Chinese. 其实这些方法都不鲜见，
These methods above are not that rare as a matter of fact, 就是也挺常见的。
They are quite ordinary. 很多人在学习各种语言的过程中，
When people are learning a language, 都能接触到这方法，都接触过这些方法。
It's highly possible that you can can access to these methods or have used these methods. 但为什么老马学成功了，
But why did Laoma become successful in language learning, 而你自己没有呢？
Yet you didn't? 想没有想过问题？
 Have you ever thought about this question before? 其实方法，它其实不是特别特别重要。
As a matter of fact, method is not that important. 最重要的是什么？执行力呀，朋友们。
What is most important? Execution, my friends. 最重要的是你把，就算只有一个方法，
The most important is that even you only had one method, 你使劲地磕它，
If you tried your best to make the full of this method, 就一定把这个东西拿下，
You're determined to make this method work, 就不断去做做做做做，
You just keep on learning and trying, 时间精力花进去——执行力。
All the time and efforts are put in it---execution. 这样你最终才能学好语言，而不是说：哎呀我，
You can really have the chance of ever succeed in learning a language, its' not like: well, I 今天试这个方法，
 have tried this method today, 明天我试那个方法。
and I will try that method tomorrow. 试来试去，试来试去，
Try this one and try that one. 到最后，365天过去了。
Finally, 365 days have just passed by like this. 哎~还是没学好。
Yet, you still haven't learned the language. 别人都可能能用中文进行自如沟通交流了。
Others might be able to communicate in Chinese freely already. 你还停留在最基础的阶段。
Yet you still stay the very basic stage. 所以执行力是最重要的。下一个，
So the execution is the most important factor. Next up, I talked to myself all the time. 我真的就是整天自言自语。
I was pretty much just speaking to myself all day every day. 那我从2011年到现在，
I've been in Beijing pretty much  基本上全部……自言自语这个真的方法很好啊，
non-stop since 2011...speaking  to yourself is really a good method, 咱们先再听一下……都在北京，
Let's listen to what he's going to say... 所以这当然非常有帮助。
So obviously that helped, 但是也不是说我每天，
But it's not like I've had someone to talk to 整天都有中国人在跟我聊天。
and practice Chinese with all day every day that whole time. 我就会跟自己聊聊：我昨天做了什么？
I would just practice speaking and talk about things I did the day before, 明天有什么安排？
things that I have planned for the next day. 这样就可以换一下，练习不同的时态，
That way you get used to switching things around, practicing different tenses  或者就是不同的一些结构，
or different structures. 然后你自己说出来，
And when you say it out loud, 可以录个音。然后就可以自己开始听听，
you can also try recording yourself. Then you try listening to yourself, What sounded weird. 这个方法：自言自语，
This method: speaking to yourself, 我觉得这个方法很有用处啊，
I think this is a very useful method, 老马说的没错，
Laoma was right, 就很多时候你并不一定能都能，
Most of time you just couldn't  找到一个语言的伙伴去
find a language partner 练习。就算你生活在中国也一样。不可能
to practice. Even if you live in China, it's the same. You just can't 随便逮一个人就成天跟你说中国话，
grab anyone just to talk to you in Chinese all day every day, 不可能。很多时候啊，
It's impossible. Most of time, 人呢很多时候都是独处的时候比较多。
People tend  to stay alone. 这个时候就需要学会自言自语。
At this moment, you need to learn to speak to yourself. 就像我之前在一个视频里说过：
Just as I said in one video before: 你可以把自己一分为二啊，对吧？然后呢，
You can split yourself into two halves, right? Then, 还要可以选一个特定的话题去说。
You can also pick a specific topic to talk about.  你不能只是随便胡言乱语，
Don't just talk about something random, 想到什么说什么，这没有意义，
Speak of anything that comes to you, which is useless, 这其实很难锻炼东西。
You can't practice your spoken Chinese in that way. 你要想到一个话题，
You need to have a topic, 然后就着这一个话题，
Then focusing on this topic,  左边这个人这么说，右边这个人这么说。
The left half talks in this way, while the right half talks in that way. 最好是来个辩论。
It's better be a debate. 正反观点，反方观点。哎~
The opinions of the the claim, and the opinions of the counterclaim. Wow~ 这样就能火热起来。
Your debate will be heated up. 你的对话自然而然就能下去了。
Your conversation then can go on and on. 你慢慢慢慢就能锻炼出来。
And your speaking skills will be sharpened gradually. 所以自言自语这个方法真的很好。
The method of speaking yourself is really very good. 特别是把自己一分为二进行自言自语的方法。
Especially the method of speaking to yourself by splitting yourself into two halves. 可以试一下。
It's worth trying. 下一个 Tongue Twisters!
Next! 绕口令。啊~
Tongue twisters!Ah~ 这个东西真的就是我2012年，
Back in 2012,  有一个老师跟我说：
I had a teach who commented on 觉得我虽然说话挺流利的，
How I spoke fairly fluently,  但是声调啊什么声母韵母都乱七八糟的。
But my tones, initials, and finals were all a mess. 所以我花了整整两个多月的时间，
So I spent over two months 练习了各种绕口令啊，发音、
practicing all types of tongue twisters. Pronunciation, 舌位、开口度等等等等，嘴唇是什么样的？
tongue positions, how wide you open your mouth, what shape your lips make, etc. It was really hard. 而且刚开始的时候，
And right when I first started, 很多人都说我发音我的口音都退步了，
A lot of people said that my pronunciation got worse instead of better. 但是再过一段时间很多人都说：Wow,
But after some time, a lot people started saying: you sound so much better than before. 所以这个刻意的练习还是非常重要。
This concerted effort was incredibly effective. 对，下面这个方法：绕口令。
Right, the next method: tongue twisters. 绕口令真的是特别能锻炼你这个中文啊。
Tongue twisters can really sharpen your spoken Chinese. 因为不管是他们说相声的还是做演员的还是学播音的，
Because no matter you wanted to perform Xiangsheng, or studied to be actors or broadcasters,  基本功都是一个绕口令。
The very basics of your study is tongue twisters. 其实绕口令这个东西它是非常有针对性的。
As a matter of fact, tongue twisters are actually very targeted. 它是针对中国各个地方它每个地方的人呐他说话特点。
Because they are targeted to speaking characteristics of Chinese from all over China. 因为中国啊各个地方方言不一样，
Because we have a lot different dialects in different parts of China, 所以各个地方人说普通话的时候都有一些问题啊。
So people from different parts of China tend to have different problems when speaking Mandarin. 他就把这些问题揪出来，哎~做些绕口令。
So the tongue twisters are created just to deal with these problems. 特别特别难。
It's very hard. 就比如像我们南方……
Such as we southerners... 南方的好多地方人都四和十不分的，
People from a lot places in the south can' distinguish 四 from 十, 这有个经典的：四是四十是十，这个，
So there comes this classic tongue twister: four is four, and ten is ten, this one, 哎特别特别难。
is super difficult for us. 对我而言，我是个纯正的南方人，
For me, a pure southerners,  我觉得这个很难发出来。
It's really very difficult for me to say this tongue twister correctly. 还有一些比如说像湖南呀，哎~重庆的那一带啊，
And in some places as Hunan province and the place around Chongqing,  他们这个 h/f不分，牛奶/牛奶 （liu lai），
People can't distinguish h and f, so there is milk and liu hai, 所以呢就有一个专门绕口令：
Some there's also a specific tongue twister created for them: 刘奶奶喝牛奶。
Grandma is drinking milk. 这个东西。
This thing,  这对他们也是很难。
is super difficult for them as well. 所以你要把这些所有的绕口令你都能
So if you can really practice all these tongue twister well,  过一遍，都能好好地刻意去练一练。
and spend some time in practice them, 你基本上中文呀，
Your Chinese will definitely, 肯定能达到比较流利的程度。
reach the fluency. Next: make friends! 对我来说影响最大的一个，
Now, I'd probably say that for me one of the biggest things 就是我2013年认识的一个朋友叫Peter，中国人啊。
was that in 2013 I met a guy named Peter, Chinese guy. 我们俩白天都有自己的工作，
We both worked during the day, 但是每天能够跟一个人聊一聊，
But having someone that you can talk to every day, 这样其实我的中文他的英文也都有非常明显的进步。
My Chinese and his English both improved a lot. 那我知道有很多人都会说：
I know a lot of people say, 应该交个男朋友女朋友，但是我见过很多外国人啊，
You should find a boyfriend or girlfriend, But I've met a lot of foreigners, you know, 主要是外国人学中文的时候，
When it comes to learning Chinese, 因为男女之间的这个说话方式会有一些
since men and women do speak a bit differently in Chinese, 不同。再加上很多中文老师都是女性。
Plus the fact that a lot of Chinese teachers are women, 所以呢很多男的说中文的时候，
A lot of guys may sound a little girly, 可能会有一点点这种嗲嗲的感觉或者有点撒娇的口音。
when speaking Chinese, it might also sound like they're trying to act cutesy. 哎~这个真的是，这个真的是。大家学习中文的时候，
Ah~ this is true, quite right. When people are learning Chinese, 学习外语也一样，其实任何语言里，
It's same for learning other languages, because in every language, 男人说话和女人说话都是有区别的。
men and women talk differently. 比如说中文有个词叫“人家”，
For example, there is word in Chinese "ren jia" which means "me" 人家其实是就是（指自己），
Ren jia actually means yourself, 人家这个词啊就是女生用的比较多。
But this word is mainly used the girls. 有点撒娇有点嗲嗲这种状态，就像老马说的一样。
It's kind of acting cutesy or girly as Laoma said. 你要个男的去说“人家”，还带一点语气说：人家~
If a guy say "ren jia" with a girl's tone: ren jia~ 这就是让，会让中国人抓狂，我和你说。Next up:
This will drive Chinese crazy, I tell you. Rap music ！ I love rap. 我自己还是非常喜欢说唱。但我知道这
Personally, I really like rap music, but I do know  不是所有人的菜。 It's not
that not every enjoy it. everybody's cup of tea, but 如果你自己愿意的话，
But if you're willing to try it out, 我还是会强烈推荐。
I really recommend rap music, 其实我本身不怎么听Rap，
Because I don't listen to rap music, 所以这点我不是特别有感触啊。
Some I don't know much about it. 不过我觉得其实真的你要说 Rap，
But if you really want to talk about Rap,  因为它特别锻炼舌头，
Because it requires a quick tongue movement, Rap它本身讲的是节奏感，
and Rap attaches importance to rhythm,  还有说话需要特别特别快。
and requires speaking super fast. 你要能把这些东西节奏感和说话很快都练下来，
So if you can master the rhythm in speaking and can speak very fast, 那你中文还能有什么问题，是不是？
Then what problem will you have for Chinese learning, right? 好。啊~口渴了。
Well. Ah~ I'm thirsty. 这么一大杯茶，这几乎是我一个上午的量吧。
Such a big bottle of tea, this is how much I'd drink before noon. Next up: Find a language idol .一个语言偶像。
 A language idol. 我第一个语言偶像肯定是大山。
My first language idol was definitely Dashan 哎~大山。这人之前我在视频提过啊，
Ah~Dashan. As I mentioned in my video before, 就中文说的特别特别好一个加拿大人。
He is a Canadian who speaks perfect Chinese. 我知道也有很多人都说他的名气他的这个标准呢，
I do know that a bunch of foreigners say that Dashan's fame and the "standard" 可能就会让他们觉得哦这个太遥远了，
he has set just seems really distant, 我根本达不到。
or unattainable, 但是我自己反而觉得这让我看到，
But, personally, I actually felt like Someone else can do it, 别人能做到，那我为什么不行呢？
If someone else can do it, why can't I? 对对对，他这个点说得好，就是：
Exactly, he's got a good point, that is: 大家可以找一个偶像啊。
You can find an idol. 就是你语言的偶像，目的不是说我要把他供起来，
The purpose of finding a language idol is not to worship him,  尊敬他。不是这样，就是觉得：
or respect him. It's not like that, it should be: 他应该是一个你可以达到的目标。
He should be the goal you can attain. 觉得：他都能做到，我为什么做不到？
You should think: if you can do it, why can't I do it? 我们都是人哪，我们都是中文学习者。
We are all human beings, we're all Chinese learners. 为什么他能做到，我做不到呢？
Why he can't achieve that, but I can't? 就是让自己树立这么一个偶像，
So you set a language idol for yourself, 作为你前进的动力。
to be the motivation for you. 后来呢，我还是觉得应该找一个中国的
Later one, I felt like I should find 这个语言偶像就是：姜文。
an actual Chinese language idol. And I went with director & actor Jiang wen. 他虽然不是北京人，
Even though Jiangwen isn't from Beijing,  但是他的这个说话方式，
the way he speaks,  我觉得再加上他的声音，
along with the fact that his voice  跟我的还是比较类似，
sounds a little like mine, 所以这就是很多朋友给我推荐的。
is the reason that a lot of people recommended. 你自己去找个语言偶像的时候呢，
When I looking for a language idol myself, 还是要找一个跟你声音比较类似的。
I try to find someone with a voice or a sound similar to mine. 这点就说到点上，就是：你要找的声音偶像，
He hit the point right here, which is: if you're trying to find a language idol,  你去模仿他的话，
so as to imitate him, 你必须找一个和你这个音色比较相近的。别人是：哦嗨的哎啦哈……
You must find someone who has similar voice to you. If someone's voice is like: ohadealala... 你是：阿拉里拉里罗~
Yet your voice is like:alalilalou~ 这样的话，其实差太远了，你学不来，
from that you can tell yours are away apart, then you can't imitate him, 对不对？你需要找一个相近的。
Right? You really need to find some with similar voice to yours. 他确实这个口音啊，
 He actually has that kind of accent, 可能也刻意地去模仿姜文的。姜文他是
It maybe that he tried to imitate Jiangwen's way of speaking. Jiangwen's way of speaking is 这个中气比较足的说话方式嘛。
 he has a lot of air from his lungs. 要是你喜欢，你也可以模仿我呀~哈哈哈。
If you want, you can imitate mine, hahaha. 咱们今天看老马这个八个诀窍啊。
Today, we've watched the eight tricks of Laoma. 第一个是看电视。第二个是
First is watching TV. Second is  什么都写下来。第三个影子跟读。
Writing down everything. The third is shadowing. 第四个自言自语。还有绕口令。
The fourth is speaking to yourself. And there're tongue twisters, 还有交朋友。还有说唱。
Making friends, Rap, 还有最后找一个语言偶像。
And the last one is finding a language idol. 其实每个方法都特别好。
Actually every method is very good. 就像我前面说的一样，
As I said before,  最重要的它不是方法，是大家的执行力！
The most important is not method, but execution! 就算只是死磕一两个方法啊。
Even if you just tried out one or two methods, 把这方法真正执行到了实处。
If you can take the full advantages of the methods, 你肯定能把中文学好。
Then you can definitely master Chinese. 就算绕口令啊啥，这个东西……
Even like tongue twisters or something, this thing... 你能把绕口令真正的说好，
If you can master tongue twisters,  你的中文就没有任何问题。
There will be no problem for your Chinese. 能比80%中国人都说的好。
You will speak better than 80% of Chinese. 真的。那么咱们今天就聊到这吧。
That's true. Let's finish today's video here. 下次再见！
See you next time!

words.word: 老马呀，就是口语老炮儿马思瑞，

同时他分享了八个学习中文的诀窍。
咱们今天就看一下这个视频，
同时呀我也和大家分享一下，
我这么多年学习语言以及我教授中文这个心得体会，
所以我今天终于要跟大家分享一下，
我是口语老炮儿马思瑞！

怎么能让你自己的英语中文，任何语言，
学的更快一些，让你的学习事半功倍，效率更高。
那我也看过很多在网上的视频，
都说我的中文是什么所有老外当中最好的。
因为我中文真的不完美。
就算我身边的人我真的见过的认识的，
有好多说外国人中文说的比我好很多。
你老能去特别好玩的特别漂亮的地儿。
我知道，他中文确实说得特别特别好。
啊这个艾米，艾米她中文说的还罢了。
星悦，可以。这几个我觉得
可能没他说的好，他过谦了。
但是我为什么比很多其他人说的好呢？
我在这几块花的时间真的就已经，
超过这个一万小时定律。说到这点，真的是学习语言啊，
你真的需要花费特别特别多的时间和精力进去学习。
你不能指望只是偶尔三天打鱼两天晒网，
你就能让自己中文说的特别好,不可能的事情，
朋友们。中国有一个成语叫做：
只要功夫深，铁杵磨成针。
大家知道铁杵什么？就是铁棒啊，铁棍子，
然后磨磨磨磨磨，再磨磨磨磨磨，
都能磨成绣花针那么小。
怎么做的？就是花时间，花精力，
还有耐心。学习语言就是这么一个过程，
你就需要花这么多时间和精力进去。
老马他花了超过一万多小时啊学习中文。
现在其实说实话就是你要学习语言，
根本没必要去语言国去学习，
都不是一个必须的选项。
因为你能接触的语言材料太多了。
就算要进行对话，也是有方法可以实现的。
关键是你首先要把时间和精力投入进去，
所有的技巧其实它并不是那么神秘的。
就是说就是：熟能生巧嘛。
时间花进去，精力花进去，
反反复复的做，反反复复的练习，
自己在中文学习上花了多少时间？
那我觉得学外语的时候看任何电视剧、
电影啊什么的都非常有用。
我是2011年到的中国是国庆节，
然后第一年在一个私立学校，
学了这种系统的普通的课程，
但是我觉得我进步最大的时候，
就是第二年我开始看好多电视剧。
对其实，这个说到他第一点，
他第一点就是看电视节目嘛。
其实他一开始说看了很多电视剧啊，

全黑。全灭。没人要他，没人对他感兴趣。

所以我之前也说过我想做一期就
推荐给大家一些中国的综艺节目。
我先给大家推荐一个吧。
就我最近和我老婆成天看的，就我们吃中饭的时候，

这《向往生活》的主要就是让城里人体验一下这个，
在乡村生活的这种状态。

就每天涉及的就是做饭呀、吃饭啊、聊天呀、

这些事情。都是很基础很生活化的东西。
大家通过这个节目能知道特别多

那我做的第二件事情就是什么都写下，
这什么都写下来什么都记下来。
那之前标题上也含着：好记性不如烂笔头。
这是中国人常说一句话。
就什么东西，有时候脑袋纯记啊记不住，
写写写。烂笔头写着写烂了嘛，就是一直写用的特别的多。
哎很多人记下来，你放在本子上，
偶尔去翻一翻，“啊！”你就想起来。
你要只是放在脑子里。很多东西“哇”！
然后自己也可以去造一些句子，
现在这样我们就是眼睛、
嘴巴、舌头、耳朵、手，多感官的这种训练。
就是说这个例句啊。自己可以造句啊，
自己造句其实我觉得比纯粹你听啊，

最终形成这种肌肉记忆嘛。
